mean_cn: n. 特别口令，假释；  v. 有条件释放，假释，使假释出狱，宣誓后释放
mean_en: permission given to a prisoner to leave prison before the end of a sentence usually as a reward for behaving well
sentence: When on parole, a released prisoner must not break the conditions, or they'll return to jail.
sentence_trans: 在保释期，被释放的囚犯必须遵守相关条件，否则他们会被送回监狱。
